text:
8 tools I (actually) use to do the work of 8 people:

1/ Gamma (gamma.app)

✦ Replaces: PowerPoint.
✦ Best AI to make slides.
☑ Free plan available.

2/ Perplexity (perplexity.ai)

✦ Replaces: Search engines & market research.
✦ Google, but with a brain.
☑ Free to use.

3/ Canva (canva.com)

✦ Replaces: Photoshop, Figma.
✦ The easiest design tool on the planet.
☑ Free plan available.

4/ Midjourney (midjourney.com)

✦ Replaces: My designer to make images.
✦ Turn text prompts into scroll-stopping images.
☑ Starts at $10/month.

5/ ChatGPT (chat.com)

✦ Replaces: Google, writers, lawyers, anything really.
✦ I use the GPT 'Prompt Maker' for prompts.
✦ The brain behind my ideas and strategy.
☑ Free. The $20 is super worth it.

6/ EasyGen (easygen.io)

✦ Replaces: Linkedin writers (or ChatGPT to write).
✦ The only tool I trust to write Linkedin posts.
☑ Free trial available (30 days).

7/ Opus Clip (opus.pro)

✦ Replaces: Manual editing or video editors.
✦ Cuts long videos into viral shorts.
☑ Free trial available.

8/ Google Veo (deepmind.google)

✦ Replaces: Recording videos (eventually).
✦ Create 5-second AI videos with text prompts.
☑ Free credits available.

Reshare ♻ to help others hire their (AI) team.
